an5.272:4.1: “Mendicants, a person with five qualities should not be appointed as meal assigner.
an5.272:4.3: They make decisions prejudiced by favoritism, hostility, stupidity, and cowardice. And they don’t know if a meal has been assigned or not.
an5.272:4.4: A person with these five qualities should not be appointed as meal assigner.
an5.272:5.1: A person with five qualities should be appointed as meal assigner.
an5.272:5.3: They don’t make decisions prejudiced by favoritism, hostility, stupidity, and cowardice. And they know if a meal has been assigned or not.
an5.272:5.4: A person with these five qualities should be appointed as meal assigner.
an5.272:6.1: A person with five qualities who has been appointed as meal assigner should not be called upon … should be called upon … should be known as a fool … should be known as astute … they keep themselves broken and damaged they keep themselves unbroken and undamaged … is cast down to hell … is raised up to heaven.
an5.272:6.3: They don’t make decisions prejudiced by favoritism, hostility, stupidity, and cowardice. And they know if a meal has been assigned or not.
an5.272:6.4: A meal assigner with these five qualities is raised up to heaven.”
